data.name: Tooltip_FutureDated
data.value: This episode has not aired yet

data.name: Tooltip_Unwatched
data.value: Unwatched - Click to mark as watched

data.name: Tooltip_Watched
data.value: Watched - Click to mark as unwatched

data.name: Tooltip_ZeroFiles
data.value: There are no files available for this episode

data.name: Tooltip_MissingEps
data.value: Missing episodes from all release groups

data.name: Tooltip_MissingEpsGroups
data.value: Missing episodes from release groups that I am collecting

data.name: MSG_ERR_DropSourceDestCheck
data.value: An import folder cannot be both the drop source and the drop destination

data.name: MSG_ERR_ImportFolderLocationCheck
data.value: The import folder location cannot be blank. Enter a valid path on OMM Server

data.name: AssociateFile
data.value: Link a file with an episode

data.name: MSG_ERR_FileNotFound
data.value: The file could not be found

data.name: MSG_ERR_AnimeIDRequired
data.value: Please enter a valid AniDB Anime ID

data.name: MSG_ERR_InvalidEpGetAnime
data.value: The episode number range you entered is not valid, do you want to refresh the data from AniDB?

data.name: MSG_ERR_InvalidEp
data.value: The Episode range you have entered is not valid.

data.name: Tooltip_DeleteLink
data.value: Remove link between this file and the episode.

data.name: INFO_SettingsEssential
data.value: All the settings on this page should be populated. Make sure to test and save the OMM Server and AniDB details before proceeding. If this is your first time running the application enter at least one import folder and the press the Run Import button.

data.name: Tooltip_GroupSearch
data.value: Search groups by name (in any language), category or tag

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBDownloadChar
data.value: Download information and images about the characters and seiyuu that appear in anime

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBDownloadRelated
data.value: When downloading information about an anime, also download information about all the related anime. This is needed to properly group related anime during the import process.

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBDownloadReleaseGroups
data.value: Download detailed information about the release/subbing groups for your anime

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBDownloadReviews
data.value: Downloaded anime reviews by AniDB users

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBDownloadSimilar
data.value: When downloading information about an anime, also download information about similar and recommended titles

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBMyListAddFiles
data.value: If selected when importing files, the files will be added to your AniDB account

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBMyListReadUnwatched
data.value: If the file is set as un-watched on AniDB, it will also be set as un-watched on your local collection

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBMyListReadWatched
data.value: If the file is set as watched on AniDB, it will also be set as watched on your local collection

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBMyListSetUnwatched
data.value: When you manually mark a video as watched, AniDB will also be updated

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBMyListSetWatched
data.value: When you finish watching a video, or manually mark a video as watched, AniDB will also be updated

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBMyListState
data.value: The storage state files will be set to when added to your list

data.name: MSG_INFO_AddedQueueCmds
data.value: Command(s) have been added to queue

data.name: MultiTypeRange
data.comment: Used when associating multiple files to an episode

data.name: MultiTypeSingle
data.comment: Used when associating multiple files to an episode

data.name: AniDBScheduleHTTP
data.value: Automatically Update Anime and Episode Information

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBScheduleHTTP
data.value: Update information about anime, and get new episode information. Only data which has changed since the last updated will be downloaded.

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBScheduleMyList
data.value: Sync information from AniDB according to the options specified in the MyList section.

data.name: DetailedInformationLink
data.value: Follow this link for an in depth explanation

data.name: INFO_SettingsWebCache
data.value: The web cache is an online database created by the developers of JMM and MyAnime. It's purpose is to fill in the gaps which other databases don't cater for, and also make the import process quicker by sharing information with other users of JMM.

data.name: Tooltip_WebCache_Anonymous
data.value: By selecting this option your AniDB username will not be sent to the web cache. However this means you will not get the benefit of remembering your own personal selections.

data.name: Tooltip_WebCache_FileEpisodes
data.value: When files do not appear in AniDB, the web cache may have information about the episode relating to that file. This is especially useful when you manually link files and don't want to lose that information.

data.name: Tooltip_WebCache_FileHashes
data.value: Try getting the file hash from the web cache before hashing locally. This can save a lot of time when importing.

data.name: Tooltip_WebCache_TvDBAssociations
data.value: Use the web cache to look up links between AniDB and TvDB. If not selected you will need to manually search for all TvDB links.

data.name: Tooltip_TvDB_FanartAutoDownload
data.value: Automatically download new fanart whenever a import is performed.

data.name: Tooltip_TvDB_FanartCount
data.value: The maximum amount of fanart images to download

data.name: Tooltip_TvDB_PosterAutoDownload
data.value: Automatically download new wide banners whenever a import is performed.

data.name: Tooltip_TvDB_WideBannerAutoDownload
data.value: Automatically download new posters whenever a import is performed.

data.name: Tooltip_MovieDB_FanartAutoDownload
data.value: Automatically download new fanart whenever a import is performed.

data.name: Tooltip_MovieDB_FanartCount
data.value: The maximum amount of fanart images to download

data.name: Tooltip_MovieDB_PosterAutoDownload
data.value: Automatically download new posters whenever a import is performed.

data.name: Tooltip_LanguageUseSynonyms
data.value: Also use synonyms from selected preferred language for display of series and groups. English and Romaji synonyms will not be used

data.name: INFO_SettingsDisplayStyle
data.value: You will need to refresh your group list to see the effects of the changes

data.name: Tooltip_ImageSize_GroupList
data.value: The images shown in the main list when viewing the groups and series

data.name: Tooltip_ImageSize_SeriesPoster
data.value: The images shown in the right pane for all the series belonging to a group

data.name: Tooltip_ImageSize_SubGroupList
data.value: The images shown in the main list when viewing sub groups or series

data.name: Tooltip_Style_GroupList
data.value: The style of groups when displayed in the main list (also sub groups)

data.name: GroupFilter_ApplyToSeries
data.value: Apply these filters when viewing the series for the group as well

data.name: Tooltip_GroupFilter_BaseCondition
data.value: Include All so that all groups are included by default. Exclude All so that no groups are included, this is meant to be used when you want to manually specify groups on an indvidual basis.

data.name: GroupFilter_Category_Help
data.value: Double click on catgeories to add them to the selected list

data.name: MSG_ERR_RatingValue
data.value: Rating must be a value between 0 and 10. Decimal points are allowed.

data.name: MSG_ERR_DaysValue
data.value: Please enter the numbers of days as an integer (Minimum is 1)

data.name: EpisodeMarkAllWatchedPrevious
data.value: Mark All Previous Watched Including EP#

data.name: GroupFilter_VideoQuality_Help
data.value: Double click on the entries to add them to the list

data.name: INFO_DuplicateFiles
data.value: Duplicate files are where you have two or more files which are exactly the same, except they are in different folders or are named differently. JMM only allows one file with the same hash in the collection.

data.name: Tooltip_DeleteDuplicateFileAll
data.value: Delete the database entry and the selected file on disk.

data.name: Tooltip_DeleteDuplicateFileEntry
data.value: Delete the database entry only. Files on disk will not be affected.

data.name: Tooltip_ReevaluateDuplicateFiles
data.value: Check all duplicate files entries to see whether the files still exist. If not delete the database entry

data.name: INFO_MultipleFiles
data.value: Multiple files are where you have two or more files for the same episode. This utility will let you examine all these occurrences, and decide which ones you want to keep

data.name: ImportSettings_UseEpisodeStatus
data.value: Set file as watched if episode is watched

data.name: Tooltip_TvDB_Schedule_Updates
data.value: Update series and episode information every 12 hours, and also download any new fanart, posters and wide banners

data.name: CrossRefSummary
data.value: TvDB and Other Non AniDB Links

data.name: TvDBSearchPrompt
data.value: Search on the TvDB or enter TvDB Series ID

data.name: Tooltip_ImageSize_EpisodeImage
data.value: The images show in the episode detail

data.name: Tooltip_HideEpisodeImageWhenUnwatched
data.value: The episode image will be hidden until the episode is watched

data.name: Tooltip_HideEpisodeOverviewWhenUnwatched
data.value: The episode overview (description) will be hidden until the episode is watched

data.name: Image_Dynamic
data.value: Set this image as the only image that will be shown

data.name: Image_Static
data.value: This image is the only image that will be shown

data.name: MovieDBSearchPrompt
data.value: Search on the MovieDB or enter MovieDB ID

data.name: Image_Default
data.value: Only this image will be used

data.name: Image_NotDefault
data.value: This image is not the default

data.name: AllEpisodesWatched
data.value: All episodes have already been watched

data.name: DeleteSeriesConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this series/group?

data.name: DeleteSeriesConfirm_Files
data.value: Also delete all the physical files?

data.name: INFO_SettingsUserAdmin
data.value: Add or edit users here. Users are stored in the database, and shared across different clients. You must always have at least one admin user.

data.name: TraktSearchPrompt
data.value: Search on Trakt or enter Trakt ID (slug)

data.name: Tooltip_ViewSeries
data.value: Open this Anime Series in a new window

data.name: Tooltip_User_IsAniDB
data.value: Any user marked as an AniDB user will be kept in sync with other AniDB users. If the user is not an AniDB user watched episodes will not be reflected on the AniDB website.

data.name: ERROR_SeriesExists
data.value: A series already exists for this anime

data.name: NoSimilarAnime
data.value: No similar anime could be found

data.name: NoRelatedAnime
data.value: No related anime could be found

data.name: ImportSettings_AutoGroupSeries
data.value: Automatically place related series into the same group

data.name: Tooltip_MyList
data.value: Forcefully add this file to your List on AniDB

data.name: DeleteSeriesConfirm_Groups
data.value: Delete any parent groups if they are empty

data.name: MyGroupsOnly
data.value: Only Release Goups I Am Collecting

data.name: Tooltip_IgnoreAnimeDownload
data.value: Ignore this Anime for Download Recommendations

data.name: Tooltip_IgnoreAnimeWatch
data.value: Ignore this Anime for Watch Recommendations

data.name: AvdumpKeyEditLink
data.value: Edit your AVDump2 UDP API Key here

data.name: AvdumpRequiredFilesLink
data.value: Make sure you have all the required files in the same folder as JMM Desktop

data.name: AvdumpSettingsError
data.value: You haven't specified your API Key and/or Client Port

data.name: Tooltip_CopyED2KClipboard
data.value: Copy the ED2K Dump to the Clipboard

data.name: DefSeries2
data.value: Selecting a default series means that all images that are dsiplayed for a group will use that

data.name: DefSeries3
data.value: default series instead of a random series within the group

data.name: Tooltip_EpisodeTitleSourceStyle
data.value: Preferred source of information when displaying the title of an episode

data.name: Tooltip_SeriesNameSourceStyle
data.value: Preferred source of information when displaying the series name for an anime

data.name: Tooltip_SeriesOverviewSourceStyle
data.value: Preferred source of information when displaying the overview (description) for an anime series

data.name: Tooltip_RemoveMissingFiles
data.value: This will remove any video files entries from your database, where the file cannot be physically found. Make sure all your network shares are available or USB drives plugged before you run this.

data.name: Tooltip_UpdateMediaInfo
data.value: The Media Info is the information about your files such as bit rate, resolution codecs etc which is read and stored the first time you import a file

data.name: Tooltip_TraktAnimeOnly
data.value: Only show activity is related to anime (ie exclude other tv series)

data.name: TraktFriendNotes
data.value: Information is updated on server every 20 minutes

data.name: PromptRateSeries
data.value: Prompt to rate series on completion

data.name: Tooltip_PromptRateSeries
data.value: Whenever you watch the final episode in a series, a prompt will appear to ask you for a rating

data.name: MALSearchPrompt
data.value: Search on MyAnimelist or enter MAL ID

data.name: Tooltip_WebCache_MALAssociations
data.value: Use the web cache to look up links between AniDB and MyAnimeList. If not selected you will need to manually search for all MAL links.

data.name: Tooltip_MAL_UpdateFrequency
data.value: How often data is updated, and how often an automatic search is performed to look for anime in your collection which doesn't have a MAL link

data.name: Tooltip_UseFanartOnSeries
data.value: User Fanart instead of posters (where available) on Series Display

data.name: Tooltip_MAL_NeverDecrease
data.value: Make sure that watched counts are always kept. This requires downloading your full list each time you watch an episode, so may be time consuming

data.name: Tooltip_SyncMalDown
data.value: Download watched states from MAL, and update your local collection and AniDB.

data.name: Tooltip_SyncMalUp
data.value: Update MAL using the watched stats from your local collection

data.name: Tooltip_WebCache_AniDB_File
data.value: This is the data associated with each individual file. Recommended for large collections

data.name: AniDBScheduleMyListStats
data.value: Automatically Get MyList Stats From AniDB

data.name: BakaBTResetBody
data.value: Reset the cookie if you are not getting any results from BakaBT when you should be. This will force a login to BakaBT again.

data.name: BakaBTSeriesBody
data.value: When searching for a series, BakaBT (and AnimeByt.es) will be the only torrent source used in the initial search

data.name: AnimeBytesResetBody
data.value: Reset the cookie if you are not getting any results from AnimeByt.es when you should be. This will force a login to AnimeByt.es again.

data.name: AnimeBytesSeriesBody
data.value: When searching for a series, AnimeByt.es (and BakaBT) will be the only torrent source used in the initial search

data.name: Tooltip_IsVariation
data.value: Use this when you don't want a file to show up in the Multiple Files Control. This may be the case where you have multiple versions of an OP/ED for clean/no clean, director's cut and other types of variations

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBDownloadCharacters
data.value: These images are shown in MyAnime 3 and Anime Buddy

data.name: Tooltip_AniDBDownloadCreators
data.value: These images are shown in MyAnime 3 and Anime Buddy (Voice Actors)
